description: Rick was washing his car when his friend, Nitro, walked right into the stream of water and got soaked, accidentally. They went inside to dry his clothes. Nitro undressed and Rick put his clothes in the dryer. Nitro was waiting on the bed with his dick hanging out of his boxers. Rick came in and tried to grab it. Nitro stopped him at first, but let him grab it after some persuasion. Rick was happy to suck that dick. Rick got his asshole pounded and got man juice all over him.
title: Boning Booty
